alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jefferson and central Gage Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 214 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hollenberg, or 11 miles north of Washington, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Odell, Diller and Harbine around 225 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Holmesville, Beatrice, Pickrell and Filley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
